verse.gurmukhi: ibpu sudwmw dwildI bwl sKweI imqRR sdwey[
verse.unicode: ਬਿਪੁ ਸੁਦਾਮਾ ਦਾਲਿਦੀ ਬਾਲ ਸਖਾਈ ਮਿਤ੍ਰ੍ਰ ਸਦਾਏ।

en.bdb: Sudama, a poor brahman, was known to be a friend of Krishna from childhood.

transliteration.english: bip sudhaamaa dhaalidhee baal sakhaiee mitrr sadhaae|
transliteration.hindi: बिपु सुदामा दालिदी बाल सखाई मित्र्र सदाए।
transliteration.en: bip sudhaamaa dhaalidhee baal sakhaiee mitrr sadhaae|
transliteration.hi: बिपु सुदामा दालिदी बाल सखाई मित्र्र सदाए।
transliteration.ipa: bɪp sʊd̪ɑmɑ d̪ɑlɪd̪i bɑl səkʰɑei mɪt̪ɹɹ səd̪ɑee.
transliteration.ur: بِپ سُداما دالدیِ بال سکھاای مترر سدااے۔

verse.gurmukhi: lwgU hoeI bwmHxI imil jgdIs dildRR gvwey[
verse.unicode: ਲਾਗੂ ਹੋਈ ਬਾਮ੍ਹਣੀ ਮਿਲਿ ਜਗਦੀਸ ਦਲਿਦ੍ਰ੍ਰ ਗਵਾਏ।

en.bdb: His brahmin wife always pestered him as to why he did not go to Lord Krishna to alleviate his poverty.

transliteration.english: laagoo hoiee baamhanee mil jagadhees dhalidhrr gavaae|
transliteration.hindi: लागू होई बाम्हणी मिलि जगदीस दलिद्र्र गवाए।
transliteration.en: laagoo hoiee baamhanee mil jagadhees dhalidhrr gavaae|
transliteration.hi: लागू होई बाम्हणी मिलि जगदीस दलिद्र्र गवाए।
transliteration.ipa: lɑGu hɔei bɑmʰəɳi mɪl d͡ʒəGəd̪is d̪əlɪd̪ɹɹ Gəʋɑee.
transliteration.ur: لاگُو هوای بامھݨیِ مل جگدیِس دلِدرر گوااے۔

verse.gurmukhi: cilAw gxdw gtIAW ikau kir jweIAY kauxu imlwey[
verse.unicode: ਚਲਿਆ ਗਣਦਾ ਗਟੀਆਂ ਕਿਉ ਕਰਿ ਜਾਈਐ ਕਉਣੁ ਮਿਲਾਏ।

en.bdb: He was perplexed and pondered over how he could get re-introduced to Krishna, who could help him meet the Lord.

transliteration.english: chaliaa ganadhaa gaTeeaa(n) kiau kar jaieeaai kaun milaae|
transliteration.hindi: चलिआ गणदा गटीआँ किउ करि जाईऐ कउणु मिलाए।
transliteration.en: chaliaa ganadhaa gaTeeaa(n) kiau kar jaieeaai kaun milaae|
transliteration.hi: चलिआ गणदा गटीआँ किउ करि जाईऐ कउणु मिलाए।
transliteration.ipa: t͡ʃəlɪəɑ Gəɳəd̪ɑ Gəʈiəɑⁿ kɪo kər d͡ʒɑeiæ koʊɳ mɪlɑee.
transliteration.ur: چلآ گݨدا گٹیِآں کا کرِ جاایاَے کاݨ ملااے۔

verse.gurmukhi: phuqw ngir duAwrkw isMG duAwir Kloqw jwey[
verse.unicode: ਪਹੁਤਾ ਨਗਰਿ ਦੁਆਰਕਾ ਸਿੰਘ ਦੁਆਰਿ ਖਲੋਤਾ ਜਾਏ।

en.bdb: He reached the town of Duaraka and stood before the main gate (of the palace of Krishna).

transliteration.english: pahutaa nagar dhuaarakaa si(n)gh dhuaar khalotaa jaae|
transliteration.hindi: पहुता नगरि दुआरका सिंघ दुआरि खलोता जाए।
transliteration.en: pahutaa nagar dhuaarakaa si(n)gh dhuaar khalotaa jaae|
transliteration.hi: पहुता नगरि दुआरका सिंघ दुआरि खलोता जाए।
transliteration.ipa: pəhʊt̪ɑ nəGər d̪ʊəɑrəkɑ sɪŋGʰə̀ d̪ʊəɑr kʰəlɔt̪ɑ d͡ʒɑee.
transliteration.ur: پهُتا نگر دُآرکا سںگھ دُآر کھلوتا جااے۔

verse.gurmukhi: dUrhu dyiK fMfauiq kir Cif isMGwsxu hir jI Awey[
verse.unicode: ਦੂਰਹੁ ਦੇਖਿ ਡੰਡਉਤਿ ਕਰਿ ਛਡਿ ਸਿੰਘਾਸਣੁ ਹਰਿ ਜੀ ਆਏ।

en.bdb: Seeing him from a distance, Krishna, the Lord, bowed and leaving his throne came to Sudama.

transliteration.english: dhoorahu dhekh dda(n)ddaut kar chhadd si(n)ghaasan har jee aae|
transliteration.hindi: दूरहु देखि डंडउति करि छडि सिंघासणु हरि जी आए।
transliteration.en: dhoorahu dhekh dda(n)ddaut kar chhadd si(n)ghaasan har jee aae|
transliteration.hi: दूरहु देखि डंडउति करि छडि सिंघासणु हरि जी आए।
transliteration.ipa: d̪urəh d̪ekʰ ɖəŋɖoʊt̪ kər ɕəɖ sɪŋGʰɑsəɳ hər d͡ʒi əɑee.
transliteration.ur: دُورهُ دےکھ ڈںڈات کر چھڈِ سںگھاسݨ هرِ جیِ آاے۔

verse.gurmukhi: pihly dy prdKxw pYrI pY ky lY gil lwey[
verse.unicode: ਪਹਿਲੇ ਦੇ ਪਰਦਖਣਾ ਪੈਰੀ ਪੈ ਕੇ ਲੈ ਗਲਿ ਲਾਏ।

en.bdb: First he circumambulated around Sudama and then touching his feet he embraced him.

transliteration.english: pahile dhe paradhakhanaa pairee pai ke lai gal laae|
transliteration.hindi: पहिले दे परदखणा पैरी पै के लै गलि लाए।
transliteration.en: pahile dhe paradhakhanaa pairee pai ke lai gal laae|
transliteration.hi: पहिले दे परदखणा पैरी पै के लै गलि लाए।
transliteration.ipa: pəhɪle d̪e pərəd̪əkʰəɳɑ pæri pæ ke læ Gəl lɑee.
transliteration.ur: پهِلے دے پردکھݨا پَےریِ پَے کے لَے گل لااے۔

verse.gurmukhi: crxodku lY pYr Doie isMGwsxu auqy bYTwey[
verse.unicode: ਚਰਣੋਦਕੁ ਲੈ ਪੈਰ ਧੋਇ ਸਿੰਘਾਸਣੁ ਉਤੇ ਬੈਠਾਏ।

en.bdb: Washing his feet he took that water and made Sudama sit on the throne.

transliteration.english: charanodhak lai pair dhoi si(n)ghaasan ute baiThaae|
transliteration.hindi: चरणोदकु लै पैर धोइ सिंघासणु उते बैठाए।
transliteration.en: charanodhak lai pair dhoi si(n)ghaasan ute baiThaae|
transliteration.hi: चरणोदकु लै पैर धोइ सिंघासणु उते बैठाए।
transliteration.ipa: t͡ʃərəɳɔd̪ək læ pær t̪ɔeɪ sɪŋGʰɑsəɳ oʊt̪e bæʈʰɑee.
transliteration.ur: چرݨودک لَے پَےر دھوا سںگھاسݨ اُتے بَےٹھااے۔

verse.gurmukhi: puCy kuslu ipAwru kir gur syvw dI kQw suxwey[
verse.unicode: ਪੁਛੇ ਕੁਸਲੁ ਪਿਆਰੁ ਕਰਿ ਗੁਰ ਸੇਵਾ ਦੀ ਕਥਾ ਸੁਣਾਏ।

en.bdb: Then Krishna lovingly enquired about his welfare and talked about the time when they were together in the service of the guru (Sandipani).

transliteration.english: puchhe kusal piaar kar gur sevaa dhee kathaa sunaae|
transliteration.hindi: पुछे कुसलु पिआरु करि गुर सेवा दी कथा सुणाए।
transliteration.en: puchhe kusal piaar kar gur sevaa dhee kathaa sunaae|
transliteration.hi: पुछे कुसलु पिआरु करि गुर सेवा दी कथा सुणाए।
transliteration.ipa: pʊɕe kʊsəl pɪəɑr kər Gʊr seʋɑ d̪i kət̪ʰɑ sʊɳɑee.
transliteration.ur: پُچھے کُسل پآر کر گُر سےوا دیِ کتھا سُݨااے۔

verse.gurmukhi: lY kY qMdul cibEnu ivdw kry AgY phucwey[
verse.unicode: ਲੈ ਕੈ ਤੰਦੁਲ ਚਬਿਓਨੁ ਵਿਦਾ ਕਰੇ ਅਗੈ ਪਹੁਚਾਏ।

en.bdb: Krishna asked for the rice sent by Sudama’s wife and after eating, came out to see off his friend Sudama.

transliteration.english: lai kai ta(n)dhul chabion vidhaa kare agai pahuchaae|
transliteration.hindi: लै कै तंदुल चबिओनु विदा करे अगै पहुचाए।
transliteration.en: lai kai ta(n)dhul chabion vidhaa kare agai pahuchaae|
transliteration.hi: लै कै तंदुल चबिओनु विदा करे अगै पहुचाए।
transliteration.ipa: læ kæ t̪əŋd̪ʊl t͡ʃəbɪoən ʋɪd̪ɑ kəre əGæ pəhʊt͡ʃɑee.
transliteration.ur: لَے کَے تںدل چباون ودا کرے اگَے پهُچااے۔

en.bdb: Though all the four boons (righteousness,wealth,fulfillment of desire and libereation) were given to Sudama by Krishna, Krishna's humbleness still made him feel totally helpless.
